PORTAL 2	
Portal 2 is a great puzzler and in my opinion is one of the best arrangements of story, comedy, music, graphics and game play.  It gives lots of reference to Portal, but it remains fresh to new and old players of this series.  The story is well developed, with good voice lines and scenes that take you through a number of different environments. 
The music and graphics make every moment noteworthy, as you venture through these different test chambers. There is something to say about its sound effects as well.  If you are not hearing the music for important scenes, then you are swamped with sounds and sound effects from different testing machines and tools.  It seems like everything from groovy lasers to singing testing cubes, have some sort of music to them.  The sound effects give a certain depth to the play of this game.  Also, it has a good co-op multiplayer which has its own story line to it.  If you are feeling more creative, or you have finished the story, you can create your own test chambers for single and co-op players and post them on Steam.  I thought the Portal 2 test chamber creator was good, having all the crucial attributes that make a test chamber work. I would have liked to have seen more extensive graphic options as seen in the main play.  Overall Portal 2 is a great game and I highly recommend it!

This is one of my favourite games I have ever played, it is genuinely something that is very special to me. While this game is not as haunting or uncomfortably lonely as the first game it isn't trying to be, and makes up for that with a longer playtime, even better humour and an even more compelling story. The music is also fantastic being very varied in its tone but still incredibly memorable. If you have not played this game, then I very highly recommend you do, it's fantastic

真的好玩，一玩就上瘾了。停不下来。

老实说难度并不算太高，我想大部分人还是能玩通关。
一定要带上你的好友一起玩，这个游戏的联机模式非常适合合作。
虽然我他妈的一条单身狗，但是和基佬玩的还是挺开心的。

讲道理，打折后就4块钱，为什么不给你的游戏生涯增加一款名作呢？

很多年后，我们明白，时间是可以战胜一切的，记得常和你的朋友联系，
还有记得戴口罩。
